resources.string:
Next release:
 · New: Cache icons in lists now shown with same indicators as on the map
 · New: Progress indication while posting a log
 · New: Menu in cache details to put cache on ignore list (but not to remove)
 · New: Upload personal note to Opencaching platforms
 · New: Function to check your login for gcvote.com
 · New: Improved feedback to user and more options when a log can not be posted
 · New: Import Garmin GGZ files
 · New: Almost full support of TerraCaching GPX files
 · New: Filter for never found caches
 · New: Maps.me shows waypoints of cache
 · New: Auto complete geocode in Geokrety logging view
 · New: Add Google Maps transit mode
 · Fix: opencaching.com officially shut down
 · Fix: Last log type for TB logs now remembered correctly
 · Fix: Don\´t accidentally bother geocaching.com for GK trackables
 · Fix: GPX files no longer violate XSD
 · Fix: Detect wrong cache IDs in GPX import to avoid posting logs for wrong caches
 · Fix: Adjustments in size and resizing of coordinate input fields
 · Fix: Maximum terrain stars displayed correctly for extremcaching.com
 · Fix: Visual indication for long press function behind "Stored" and "Filter" icons in main menu
 · Fix: Contents of cache lists might get inconsistent if active list is changed
 · Fix: Close keyboard when starting search
 · Fix: Close search field when returning from search
 · Fix: Remove duplicate filter for offline logs
 
 
 2015.08.03:
 · Fix: Possible crash while editing personal notes
 · Fix: Waypoints of caches may be missing on GPX import
 · Fix: Crash if talking compass is started without target
 · Fix: Request to gc.com tile server sent for caches from unknown sources
 
 
 2015.07.08:
 · Fix: Alphabetical sorting of trackables in log window
 · Fix: Adapting to geocaching.com changes (waypoint coordinate format)
 
 
 2015.06.19:
 · Fix: Crash in "About c:geo" on Android 4.1
 · Fix: Crash when starting map on some devices
 · Fix: Try to allocate more memory on Android 3 and above to avoid crashes on memory intense operations
 
 
 2015.06.15:
 · New: Improved waypoint editor design (Save button now in title bar)
 · New: Full support of GeoKrety (Use: Menu - Services - GeoKrety)
 · New: Optionally disable direction line in maps
 · New: Undo available for some actions
 · New: Copy coords from waypoints to clipboard
 · New: Catch more http links to GPX files from the browser
 · New: Only turn off GPS in some views if "Low power mode" is active in settings
 · New: Refresh menu option for trackables
 · New: Can import TerraCaching.com GPX files
 · New: Also offer c:geo for opening https cache links
 · Fix: Close search bar when selecting a cache
 · Fix: List filter sometimes lost when returning to list
 · Fix: Sygic navigation working again
 · Fix: Don't automove marked caches when switching lists
 · Fix: Waypoint type naming on GPX export corrected
 · Fix: Improved refresh button size in cache details
 · Fix: Fixed some possible memory leaks
 · Fix: Wrong log count shown after logging something else than a found
 · Fix: Copy to clipboard not possible on Android 5.1
 · Fix: Cache links in Groundspeaks weekly mails not opening
 · Fix: Heading line had wrong target when started from compass
 · Fix: Crash opening geochecker from cache
 
 
 Known Limitations/Bugs:
 · Device menu button not working on map popup
 Please use the three dot button instead
 · Live map:
 Approximated coords due to limitations on the GC-website
 Be aware: If navigation is started directly from live map it may also use the approximated coords!
 In fast mode the cache type might be wrong in rare cases
 On low zoom owned/found caches may not be hidden anymore
